modName: Revealing barkeep outfit for Sundracon males
summary: What\'s the male version of wench? Mench?
descriptionHtml:
If you\'re like me and you\'ve worked food service industry jobs where the management thoughtfully provided an apron for you to wear, but one that did not adequately protect your fine duds from the fine slop you slung all day, you probably never considered the obvious solution -- just don\'t wear pants.

Also, you may have found your employer unhappy that you chose to wear your apron while during a do-it-yourself oil change. They actually expect you to wash your own gear, too!

Well, fret no more: now you can wear your service gear and leave your fancy robes in your locker, while keeping your apron and bar-rag spotless, thanks to the revolutionary Resolve enchantment. No longer will your customers cringe while you use that filthy rag to clean their glass.

Bonus: expect higher tips -- not that you\'ll have any place to put them.

Requires:
Sundracon mesh from skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488
author: Seedye
